briefdescription.para: reads a polygon mesh from a file.

detaileddescription.para:
Supported file formats are the following:
IOStreamOFF (.off)
IOStreamOBJ (.obj)
IOStreamSTL (.stl)
IOStreamPLY (.ply)
IOStreamGocad (.ts)
IOStreamVTK (.vtp)
The format is detected from the filename extension (letter case is not important).
The data is expected to represent a 2-manifold (possibly with borders).

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.
whether extra information is printed when an incident occurs during reading
Type: Boolean

detaileddescription.para: Other named parameters may be used according to the file extension, see I/O Functions for an exhaustive list.

simplesect.para: true if reading was successful, false otherwise.
CGAL::Polygon_mesh_processing::IO::read_polygon_mesh() if the data is not 2-manifold

briefdescription.para: writes a polygon mesh in a file.

detaileddescription.para:
Supported file formats are the following:
IOStreamOFF (.off)
IOStreamOBJ (.obj)
IOStreamSTL (.stl)
IOStreamPLY (.ply)
IOStreamGocad (.ts)
IOStreamVTK (.vtp)
The format is detected from the filename extension (letter case is not important).

parameterdescription.para: a model of FaceListGraph and HalfedgeListGraph

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.
a parameter used to set the precision (i.e. how many digits are generated) of the output stream
Type: int
Extra: This parameter is only meaningful while using ASCII encoding.
indicates whether data should be written in binary (true) or in ASCII (false)
Type: Boolean
Extra: This parameter is only meaningful for formats that support binary encoding.
whether extra information is printed when an incident occurs during reading
Type: Boolean

detaileddescription.para: Other named parameters may be used according to the file extension, see I/O Functions for an exhaustive list.

simplesect.para: true if writing was successful, false otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &filename, const GraphRange &gs, const std::vector< std::string > &names)
memberdef.name: write_3MF

briefdescription.para: writes the triangle meshes contained in gs into the file filename, using the IOStream3MF.

parameterdescription.para: a model of the concepts RandomAccessContainer and BackInsertionSequence whose value_type is a model of the concepts FaceGraph and HalfedgeListGraph that has only triangle faces.
the name of the 3mf file to write
a container of triangle meshes to write. An internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available for each mesh.
a range of std::string associating a name to each mesh to be written out, which will appear in the output

simplesect.para: true if the writing is successful, false otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::istream &is, std::pair< std::string, std::string > &name_and_color, Graph &g, const NamedParameters &np=parameters::default_values())
memberdef.name: read_GOCAD

briefdescription.para: reads the graph g from the input stream, using the IOStreamGocad.

detaileddescription.para: The data is expected to represent a 2-manifold (possibly with borders).

simplesect.para: The graph g is not cleared, and the data from the stream are appended.

parameterdescription.para: name and color of the mesh
the graph to be built from the input data

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.
whether extra information is printed when an incident occurs during reading
Type: Boolean

simplesect.para: true if reading was successful and the resulting mesh is valid, false otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &fname, std::pair< std::string, std::string > &name_and_color, Graph &g, const NamedParameters &np=parameters::default_values())
memberdef.name: read_GOCAD

briefdescription.para: reads the graph g from the file fname, using the IOStreamGocad.

detaileddescription.para: The data is expected to represent a 2-manifold (possibly with borders).

simplesect.para: The graph g is not cleared, and the data from the file are appended.

parameterdescription.para: the name of the input file
name and color of the mesh
the graph to be built from the input data

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.
whether extra information is printed when an incident occurs during reading
Type: Boolean

simplesect.para: Overloads of this function for specific models of the concept FaceGraph.
true if reading was successful and the resulting mesh is valid, false otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::ostream &os, const char *name, const Graph &g, const NamedParameters &np=parameters::default_values())
memberdef.name: write_GOCAD

briefdescription.para: writes the graph g into the output stream os, using the IOStreamGocad.

parameterdescription.para: the name that will be assigned to g in the output file

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.
a parameter used to set the precision (i.e. how many digits are generated) of the output stream
Type: int
Default: the precision of the stream os

simplesect.para: true if writing was successful, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: writes the graph g in the IOStreamGocad into os.

detaileddescription.para: The name assigned to gin the output is anonymous.

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.
a parameter used to set the precision (i.e. how many digits are generated) of the output stream
Type: int
Default: the precision of the stream os

simplesect.para: true if writing was successful, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: writes the graph g into a file named fname, using the IOStreamGocad.

detaileddescription.para: In this overload, fname is used as the name of the graph within the file.

parameterdescription.para: the name of the output file

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.
a parameter used to set the precision (i.e. how many digits are generated) of the output stream
Type: int

simplesect.para: Overloads of this function for specific models of the concept FaceGraph.

Ignores comment lines which start with a hash, and lines with whitespace.

whether extra information is printed when an incident occurs during reading

briefdescription.para: reads the graph g from data in the input stream, using the IOStreamOFF.

detaileddescription.para: The data is expected to represent a 2-manifold (possibly with borders).

This function reads the point property as well as vertex normals (NOFF), vertex and face colors (COFF), and texture vertex coordinates (TOFF). Those properties are stored in property maps that are passed through named parameters (see below), when passed.
Ignores comment lines which start with a hash, and lines with whitespace.

simplesect.para: The graph g is not cleared, and the data from the stream are appended.

parameterdescription.para: the graph to be built from the input data

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.
a property map associating normals to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Vector_3 as value type
Default: vertex normals that may exist in the input will be ignored
a property map associating colors to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and CGAL::IO::Color as value type
Default: vertex colors that may exist in the input will be ignored
a property map associating textures to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_2 as value type
Default: vertex textures that may exist in the input will be ignored
a property map associating colors to the faces of g
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::face_descriptor as key type and CGAL::IO::Color as value type
Default: face colors that may exist in the input will be ignored
whether extra information is printed when an incident occurs during reading
Type: Boolean

simplesect.para: true if reading was successful and the resulting mesh is valid, false otherwise.
Overloads of this function for specific models of the concept FaceGraph.

a property map associating colors to the vertices of g

Default: vertex colors that may exist in the input will be ignored
a property map associating textures to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_2 as value type
Default: vertex textures that may exist in the input will be ignored
a property map associating colors to the faces of g

briefdescription.para: reads the graph g from the input stream, using the IOStreamPLY.

detaileddescription.para: The data is expected to represent a 2-manifold (possibly with borders).

simplesect.para: To read a binary file, the flag std::ios::binary must be set during the creation of the ifstream.

parameterdescription.para: the graph to be built from the input data

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.
a property map associating to each vertex of graph a unique index
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and std::size_t as value type
Default: vertex indices that may exist in the input will be ignored
a property map associating colors to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and CGAL::IO::Color as value type
Default: vertex colors that may exist in the input will be ignored
a property map associating colors to the faces of g
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::face_descriptor as key type and CGAL::IO::Color as value type
Default: face colors that may exist in the input will be ignored
whether extra information is printed when an incident occurs during reading
Type: Boolean

simplesect.para: true if reading was successful and the resulting mesh is valid, false otherwise.
Overloads of this function for specific models of the concept FaceGraph.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::ostream &os, const Graph &g, const std::string &comments, const NamedParameters &np=parameters::default_values())
memberdef.name: write_PLY

briefdescription.para: writes the graph in an output stream, using the IOStreamPLY.

simplesect.para: To write to a binary file, the flag std::ios::binary must be set during the creation of the ofstream, and the IO::Mode of the stream must be set to BINARY.

parameterdescription.para: a string included line by line in the header of the PLY stream (each line will be precedeed by "comment ")

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.
a property map associating to each vertex of graph a unique index
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and std::size_t as value type
Default: vertex indices that may exist in the input will be ignored
a property map associating colors to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and CGAL::IO::Color as value type
Default: vertex colors that may exist in the input will be ignored
a property map associating colors to the faces of g
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::face_descriptor as key type and CGAL::IO::Color as value type
Default: face colors that may exist in the input will be ignored
a parameter used to set the precision (i.e. how many digits are generated) of the output stream
Type: int
Default: the precision of the stream os
Extra: This parameter is only meaningful while using ASCII encoding.

simplesect.para: true if writing was successful, false otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &fname, const Graph &g, const std::string &comments, const NamedParameters &np=parameters::default_values())
memberdef.name: write_PLY

briefdescription.para: writes the graph in the output file fname, using the IOStreamPLY.

parameterdescription.para: the name of the output file
a string included line by line in the header of the PLY stream (each line will be precedeed by "comment ")

listitem.para: indicates whether data should be written in binary (true) or in ASCII (false)
Type: Boolean
a property map associating points to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.
a property map associating to each vertex of graph a unique index between 0 and num_vertices(graph) - 1
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and std::size_t as value type
Default: no vertex indices in the output
a property map associating colors to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and CGAL::IO::Color as value type
Default: no vertex color in the output
a property map associating colors to the faces of g
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::face_descriptor as key type and CGAL::IO::Color as value type
Default: no face color in the output
a parameter used to set the precision (i.e. how many digits are generated) of the output stream
Type: int
Extra: This parameter is only meaningful while using ASCII encoding.

simplesect.para: true if writing was successful, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: writes the graph g in the output stream os, using the IOStreamSTL.

simplesect.para: To write to a binary file, the flag std::ios::binary must be set during the creation of the ofstream, and the IO::Mode of the stream must be set to BINARY.

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.
a parameter used to set the precision (i.e. how many digits are generated) of the output stream
Type: int
Default: the precision of the stream os
Extra: This parameter is only meaningful while using ASCII encoding.

simplesect.para: The graph must contain only triangle faces.
true if writing was successful, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: reads a PolyData in the IOStreamVTK into a triangulated surface mesh.

detaileddescription.para: The data is expected to represent a 2-manifold (possibly with borders).

simplesect.para: The graph g is not cleared, and the data from the file are appended.

parameterdescription.para: the path to the file that will be read

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of WritablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.

simplesect.para: true if reading was successful, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: writes a triangulated surface mesh in the PolyData XML format (IOStreamVTK).

parameterdescription.para: the triangle mesh to be output
optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: indicates whether data should be written in binary (true) or in ASCII (false)
Type: Boolean
a property map associating points to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.
a property map associating to each vertex of graph a unique index between 0 and num_vertices(graph) - 1
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and std::size_t as value type
Default: no vertex indices in the output
a parameter used to set the precision (i.e. how many digits are generated) of the output stream
Type: int
Default: the precision of the stream os

simplesect.para: g contains only triangular faces
true if writing was successful, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: writes a triangulated surface mesh the file fname, in the PolyData XML format (IOStreamVTK).

parameterdescription.para: the name of the output file
the triangle mesh to be output
optional sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: indicates whether data should be written in binary (true) or in ASCII (false)
Type: Boolean
a property map associating points to the vertices of g
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and Point_3 as value type
Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.
a property map associating to each vertex of graph a unique index between 0 and num_vertices(graph) - 1
Type: a class model of ReadablePropertyMap with boost::graph_traits<Graph>::vertex_descriptor as key type and std::size_t as value type
Default: no vertex indices in the output
a parameter used to set the precision (i.e. how many digits are generated) of the output stream
Type: int

simplesect.para: g contains only triangular faces
true if writing was successful, false otherwise.

Extra: If this parameter is omitted, an internal property map for CGAL::vertex_point_t must be available in Graph.
